body:
2.1. If you don't assign the control honeybee will assign a default one for you. Hover over the input to be able to read the default assumptions.

2.2. Based on the [source code](https://github.com/MITSustainableDesignLab/Daysim/blob/combined/src/daysim/ds_el_lighting.c#L234) it does it regardless of control mode and based on user behavior (active vs passive).
